formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: L_{\text{design}} \;=\; \begin{cases} L_0, & \text{if not eligible or } A_T < A_{\min} \\ \max\!\big( L_{\min},\; \min(L_0,\; L_r) \big), & \text{otherwise} \end{cases}
formulas.raw: L_{\text{design}} \;=\; \begin{cases} L_0, & \text{if not eligible or } A_T < A_{\min} \\ \max\!\big( L_{\min},\; \min(L_0,\; L_r) \big), & \text{otherwise} \end{cases}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Uniform live load reduction per ASCE 7-22 Section 4.7 (schematic form): 1) Eligibility threshold and base parameters For a member supporting tributary area A_T and element factor K_LL, with base live load L_0: Reduction candidate: $$ L_r \;=\; L_0 \left( 0.25 \;+\; \frac{15}{\sqrt{K_{LL}\,A_T}} \right) $$ Apply practical bounds: $$ L_r \le L_0 \quad\text{and}\quad A_T \ge A_{\min} $$ 2) Minimum caps (per Section 4.7, by element and condition): $$ L_{\min} \;=\; \alpha\,L_0 \quad\text{with}\quad \alpha \in \{0.50,\;0.40,\;\text{as applicable}\} $$ 3) Final design uniform live load: $$ L_{\text{design}} \;=\; \begin{cases} L_0, & \text{if not eligible or } A_T < A_{\min} \\ \max\!\big( L_{\min},\; \min(L_0,\; L_r) \big), & \text{otherwise} \end{cases} $$ Unit conversions used by this tool: 1 psf = 0.04788 kPa; 1 lb = 0.004448 kN; 1 ft² = 0.092903 m².

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Compute the candidate reduction: Step 1: L_r = L0 (0.25 + 15 / sqrt(K_LL · A_T)) sqrt(K_LL · A_T) = sqrt(1.0 · 400) = 20 0.25 + 15/20 = 0.25 + 0.75 = 1.00 L_r = 50 psf × 1.00 = 50 psf Step 2: Apply bounds and cap: L_r ≤ L0 → OK; α·L0 = 0.50 × 50 = 25 psf Final: L_design = max(25, 50) = 50 psf (no reduction governs at this area)
